prompt: Observational, documentary-style image of two technical founders collaborating in a thoughtfully designed modern workspace, bathed in warm, golden-hour natural light. Medium-close shot at eye level, showing authentic focus and engaged body language as they discuss and gesture over a wooden desk with minimal, quality tools. Soft ambient lighting, amber and taupe tones dominate the scene with subtle green accents from plants. The environment features natural materials—wood, ceramic mugs, glassware—creating a premium, inviting atmosphere that balances sophistication with warmth. Shallow depth of field softly blurs the background, highlighting the human connection and clarity of the moment.
